schools.name: Regl Inst Scholastic Excellence
schools.school-summary: Regl Inst Scholastic Excellence, a public school located in Worth, IL, serves grades 6-12 in the Region 07 South Cook Intermediate Service Center 4 School District.
schools.district-name: Region 07 South Cook Intermediate Service Center 4 School District
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Worth Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Worth Elementary School, a public school located in Worth, IL, serves grades PK-5 in the Worth School District 127.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 5 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
